attributes.action: Keep the postal service wholly British owned and to stop any moves to sell parts of it to foreign interests.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: I believe there has been too much selling of our history and industries to foreign interests. The Government states the postal service cannot 'pay its way', but has recently approved a £4m contract to the Dutch to deliver a large proportion of it's own mail. Such a decision undermines our postal service and demoralises it's employees. I would ask all like minded British Citizens to support this petition and to make a stand against any further selling off of our 'Crown Jewels'
